title: 52 Sexy Valentine's Day Gifts for *Fifty Shades of Grey* Fans

persons.name: margaret flately if fifty shades of grey

text: 52 Naughty Valentine's Day Gifts for Fifty Shades of Grey Fans Consider these a V-day win. Share via Twitter Graphic by Margaret Flately If Fifty Shades of Grey were a holiday, it would be Valentine's Day without a doubt. (It's no surprise that the second movie in the series, Fifty Shades Darker , drops on February 10.) This pop culture powerhouse goes hand in hand with Valentine's Day, much like peanut butter and jelly or handcuffs and spanking paddles. And if you're trying to pick the perfect gift for a person who's into the Fifty Shades books or movies, you probably know you want to give them something they wouldn't open in front of their parents but may not be sure where to start. Don't worry, we've got you covered. These 52 Valentine's Day gifts , ranging from X-rated sexual accessories to PG-13 lingerie , are perfect for anyone obsessed with Fifty Shades . Find the level of naughty that best meets your needs and desires, and design your night from there. Your partner will never forget these giftsâ€”or the fun you had with them. Coco de Mer
